H0.text: Plasma makes up most of the universe.

H1.text: Carbon is the type of matter that makes up most of the universe.

H2.text: Liquid is the type of matter that makes up most of the universe.

H3.text: Gas is the type of matter that makes up most of the universe.

A4.text: It is estimated that 99.9% of all ordinary matter in the universe is plasma.

A5.text: Plasma constitutes more than 99% of matter observed in the visible universe.
